title: Collected personal data used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: your personal data is used for limited purposes
tosdr.tldr: SoundCloud collects data that you provide, but also automatically. Information collected about you is only used for a list of purposes which are reasonable. Your data is not shared with any third-party, except for the features you use.
